description: Contents of British Antarctic Territory Gazette (No. 50) 2016 to 2017, published electronically as cited in the Official Gazette (Publication) Order 2016.

The Registrar General (Acting Appointment) Notice 2017 (No. 1 of 2017)

details.body:
Appointments and relinquishment of offices

Under the British Antarctic Territory Order 1989 (Section 4)

Appointments

John Kittmer to be Commissioner for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 10 December 2016
Benjamin Robert Merrick to be Commissioner for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 7 August 2017

Reliquishments

Peter Hayes as Commissioner for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 9 December 2016
John Kittmer as Commissioner for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 30 June 2017

Under the Administration of Justice Ordinance 1990 (Section 19)

Appointments

Martine Kushner to be Senior Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 13 October 2016

Reliquishments

Clare Faulds as Senior Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 12 October 2016

Under the Administration of Justice Ordinance 1990 (Section 28)

Appointments

David Alan Davies to be Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 1 October 2016
Paul John Samways to be Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 1 October 2016
David Thomas Wattam to be Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 18 September 2017
Jessica Adelaide Walkup to be Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 18 September 2017
Richard Alexander Warren to be Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 18 September 2017
Malcolm William Airey to be Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 18 September 2017
Simon Martin Garrod to be Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 18 September 2017

Relinquishments

John Hall as Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 31 December 2016
Malcolm Airey as Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 31 March 2017
Jessica Adelaide Walkup as Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 31 March 2017
Adam Bradley as Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 18 September 2017
Michael Wragg Brian as Magistrate for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 18 September 2017

Under the Administration of Justice Ordinance 1990 (Section 34)

Appointments

Martine Kushner to be Coroner for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 13 October 2016

Relinquishments

Clare Faulds as Coroner for the British Antarctic Territory, with effect from 12 October 2016

Laws and Legal Notices

Ordinances

  • The Marriage Ordinance (No. 4 of 2016)
  • The Appropriation (2016-2017) Ordinance 2016 (No. 4a of 2016) (PDF, 121 KB, 2 pages)
  • The Registration Ordinance (No. 5 of 2016) (PDF, 2.41 MB, 16 pages)
  • The Interpretation and General Provisions (Amendment) Ordinance (No. 6 of 2016)
  • The Appropriation (2017-2018) Ordinance 2017 (No. 1 of 2017) (PDF, 171 KB, 1 page)

Statutory Instruments

  • The Marriage Rules (Fees) 2016 Statutory Instrument (No. 2 of 2016) (PDF, 269 KB, 2 pages)
  • The Registration Ordinance Regulations (Fees) (No. 3 of 2016) (PDF, 243 KB, 2 pages)
  • The Registrar General (Acting Appointment) Notice 2017 (No. 1 of 2017) (PDF, 218 KB, 1 page)

Licences

  • British Antarctic Territory in respect of a coin produced with a family of Crabeater Seals (PDF, 365 KB, 3 pages)
  • British Antarctic Territory in respect of a coin produced with a Southern Right Whale (PDF, 361 KB, 3 pages)
  • British Antarctic Territory in respect of a coin produced of the Larsen B Ice Shelf (PDF, 368 KB, 3 pages)

Orders in Council

All Orders in Council are published on the UK legislation website, which is managed by The National Archives on behalf of HM Government:

  • 2016

    • The Iran (Sanctions) (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) Order 2016/560
    • The Democratic People’s Republic of Korea (Sanctions) (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) Order 2016/630
    • The Liberia and Côte d’Ivoire (Sanctions) (Overseas Territories) (Revocations) Order 2016/766
    • The Democratic People’s Republic of Korea (Sanctions) (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) (No. 2) Order 2016/769
    • The Extradition Act 2003 (Overseas Territories) Order 2016/990
    • The Democratic People’s Republic of Korea (Sanction) (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) (No. 3) Order 2016/991
    • The Iran (Sanctions) (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) (No. 2) Order 2016/1120
    • The ISIL (Da’esh) and Al-Qaida (Sanctions) (Overseas Territories) Order 2016/1218

  • 2017

    • The Terrorist Asset-Freezing etc. Act 2010 (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) Order 2017/157
    • The Democratic Republic of the Congo (Sanctions) (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) Order 2017/160
    • The Syria (Restrictive Measures) (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) Order 2017/169
    • The Emergency Powers (Overseas Territories) Order 2017/181
    • The Democratic People’s Republic of Korea (Sanctions) (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) Order 2017/320
    • The Falkland Islands Courts (Overseas Jurisdiction) (Amendment) Order 2017/777
    • The Antarctic Act 1994 (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) Order 2017/779
    • The Democratic People’s Republic of Korea (Sanctions) (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) (No. 2) Order 2017/780
    • The Policing and Crime Act (Financial Sanctions) (Overseas Territories) Order 2017/984

See also the Gazette for 2013 to 2016.
